about_the_game:
Grotesque Beauty Artbook

The official fan pack for Grotesque Beauty featuring a 30-page artbook showing off early concept art, design process to the final visual look of the game. Annotations help provide an insight into the early stages of development.

The Uninvited Comic

A 14-page horror comic I made years taking my stories into a game format. The Uninvited is a story inspired by one night where I came home to find someone had burgled my house. Of course, things don't seem right about the home intrusion.

Blink Comic
A wordless 15-page horror comic inspired by a scary image that came to my mind when I left my house one night: What if I looked back at my house and saw the lights coming back on?
